general.name: mos_target_catalog
general.description: The table stores the results of the cross-match used for DR18 targeting. All entries in this table are expected to be unique physical objects drawn from one or more parent catalogues. The mos_target_catalog_to_ tables provide the relationship between mos_target_catalog objects and their parent catalogue counterparts.

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

releases.name: DR18
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_target_catalog-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

catalogid.name: CATALOGID
catalogid.description: The SDSS identifier for a unique object in this cross-match run.

ra.name: RA
ra.description: The right ascension of the target in ICRS coordinates for J2015.5. Taken from the lead parent catalogue

dec.name: DEC
dec.description: The declination of the target in ICRS coordinates for J2015.5. Taken from the lead parent catalogue

pmra.name: PMRA
pmra.description: The proper motion of the target in right ascension. Taken from the lead parent catalogue. This is a true angle (i.e., the cos(dec) factor has been applied)

pmdec.name: PMDEC
pmdec.description: The proper motion of the target in declination. Taken from the lead parent catalogue

parallax.name: PARALLAX
parallax.description: The parallax of the target. Taken from the lead parent catalogue

lead.name: LEAD
lead.description: The name of the parent catalogue from which this target was selected and whose data was used to determine its astrometric position.

version_id.name: VERSION_ID
version_id.description: The internal version for the cross-match.
